title: High performance long chain polyesters via melt copolymerization of cutin-inspired monomers
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00454J, Paper
Zewen Zhu, Joshua T. Damron, Jong K. Keum, Logan Kearney, Vera Bocharova, Jeffrey C. Foster
Herein, we report a simple strategy to achieve good mechanical properties in bio-inspired long-chain polyesters via melt copolymerization.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
